long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A extension to see the infamous Nittany Lion when you submit a Canvas assignment!

Tired of being demotivated to get assignments done? Let the Nittany Lion take that burden away, and see his infamous 3rd down animation (the OG one) every time you submit a Canvas assignment.


Features
See the infamous Nittany Lion every time you submit a Canvas assignment!

Settings:
Enable/Disable Extension
Toggle Functionality for:
Canvas Assignments
Quizzes
Other "Submit" Assignments
Google Classroom
Gradescope
Volume
Full Screen Mode
Random UT Theme Quote
Tailwind CSS
